output:
A Long Ago
A long ago when he was young and he wandered out
Fully free of anger, the sky above his feet were on the ground
He trod the time of innocence and blame
Just a face to believe in humankind, the blue rose will go on
Ponytail boy will grow up to live these dreams
The covering was ragged, the love was here, now
Can they feel the sorrow? No dignity, the judges show him down
Ponytail boy will grow up to live these dreams
Guitar Solo
Ponytail boy will grow up, will live these dreams
